oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Alberta Infrastructure is responsible for infrastructure planning, and building and managing government-owned infrastructure. The Ministry of Infrastructure has taken on the responsibility of the Oil Sands Secretariat to emphasize the importance of managing the growth of one of Alberta's greatest resources.
